name: Zombie Sniper: Head Shoot
description:
Defeat the virus of ultimate zombies’ dead real trigger before the infection spreads all over and kill the zombies with different Sniper Death Shooting Assault and dead shooter gunshots to stop the tsunami of evils.

Features:
• Modern Sniper Guns
• Deadly and horrible Zombies
• Realistic Environment
• Real time Sounds
• Lots of Challenging Levels
